name: Sutter Health California Pacific Medical Center
description: California Pacific Medical Center (CPMC), a Sutter Health affiliate, is one of the largest not-for-profit medical centers in California. At four campuses located throughout San Francisco, CPMC provides inpatient emergency and outpatient services and offers education, screening and financial support in some of the city’s most underserved areas.

address: 3555 Cesar Chavez Street, San Francisco, CA, 94110
